00014 string LoadFunc(char* func)
00015 {
00016     string file;
00017     file += "../data/shaders/func/";
00018     file += func;
00019     file += ".shad";
00020     ifstream fin(file.c_str());
00021     if(!fin) 
00022         return "null";
00023     string data;
00024     char ch;
00025     while(fin.get(ch))
00026         data+=ch;
00027 
00028     return data;
00029 }

00035 
00043 string computeTexel(Texture *t, string name)
00044 {
00045     string ret = "\n";
00046 
00047     //environment mapping - we need function to generate reflection coordinates
00048     if(t->GetType() == ENV) 
00049         ret += "  " + name + "_texture = envMapping(color,eyeVec,normal," + name + ", " + name + "_intensity);\n";
00050     //cube map - use samplerCube
00051     else if(t->GetType() == CUBEMAP) 
00052         ret += "  " + name + "_texture = textureCube(" + name + ", " + name + "_cubeCoords);\n";
00053     //cube map - use reflection vector
00054     else if(t->GetType() == CUBEMAP_ENV) 
00055         ret += "  " + name + "_texture = textureCube(" + name + ", reflVec) * " + name + "_intensity;\n";
00056     //default 2D texture
00057     else 
00058         ret += "  " + name + "_texture = texture(" + name + ", " + name + "_texcoord);\n";
00059 
00060     switch(t->GetMode())
00061     {
00063     case ADD:
00064         ret +=
00065             "  //" + name + ", ADD mode\n"
00066             "  color.rgb += " + name + "_texture.rgb;\n"
00067             "  color.a *= " + name + "_texture.a;\n"
00068             "  color = clamp (color, 0.0, 1.0);\n";
00069         break;
00071     case MODULATE:
00072         ret +=
00073             "  //" + name + ", MODULATE mode\n"
00074             "  color *= " + name + "_texture;\n";
00075         break;
00077     case DECAL:
00078         ret +=
00079             "  //" + name + ", DECAL mode\n"
00080             "  color = vec4(mix(color.rgb, " + name + "_texture.rgb, " + name + "_texture.a), color.a);\n";
00081         break;
00083     case BLEND:
00084         ret +=
00085             "  //" + name + ", BLEND mode\n"
00086             "  color = vec4 ( vec3(mix(color.rgb, gl_TextureEnvColor[0].rgb, " + name + "_texture.rgb)), color.a * " + name + "_texture.a);\n";
00087         break;
00089     case REPLACE:
00090         ret +=
00091             "  //" + name + ", REPLACE mode\n"
00092             "  color = " + name + "_texture;\n";
00093         break;          
00094     };
00095     return ret;
00096 }

00105 bool TMaterial::BakeMaterial(int light_count)
00106 {
00107     //dont't bake linked custom shader
00108     if(m_custom_shader)
00109         return true;
00110 
00111     cout<<"Baking material "<<m_name<<endl;
00112 
00113     string tmp = m_name;        //temporary string for comparison
00114 
00118 
00119     //shader version. If OpenGL4 is supported, use 400, else 330
00120     string version = "330";
00121     if(GLEW_ARB_gpu_shader5)
00122         version = "400";
00123 
00125     string vert_vars = "//GLSL vertex shader generated by gluxEngine\n";    //vertex shader variables
00126     vert_vars +=    "//Material: \"" + m_name + "\"\n\n"
00127         "//generic vertex attributes\n"
00128         "layout(location = 0) in vec3 in_Vertex;\n"
00129         "layout(location = 1) in vec3 in_Normal;\n"
00130         "layout(location = 2) in vec2 in_Coord;\n\n"
00131         "//modelview matrix\n"
00132         "uniform mat4 in_ModelViewMatrix;\n\n"
00133         "//projection and shadow matrices\n"
00134         "layout(std140) uniform Matrices{\n"
00135         "  mat4 in_ProjectionMatrix;\n";
00136 
00137     //add also shadow matrices into uniform block (for each light). Only if shadow map is bound to material
00138     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00139         if(m_it->second->GetType() == SHADOW)
00140             vert_vars += "  mat4 " + m_it->first + "_texMatrix;\n";
00141 
00142     //finish uniform block and add texture coordinates
00143     vert_vars +=    "};\n"
00144         "//texture coordinate\n"
00145         "out vec2 fragTexCoord;\n"
00146         "//depth of vertex\n"
00147         "out float v_depth;\n";
00148 
00149     string vert_func;                                                       //vertex shader functions
00150     //vertex shader main function
00151     string vert_main = 
00152         "\nvoid main()\n"
00153         "{\n"
00154         "  vec4 vertex = vec4(in_Vertex,1.0);\n"
00155         "  vec3 dNormal = in_Normal;\n";        //vertices and normals for further calculations 
00156 
00158     bool displace = false;
00159     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00160     {
00161         if(m_it->second->GetType() == DISPLACE)
00162         {
00163             string texname = m_it->second->GetName();
00164             //add texture samplers: for normal and displacement map (assume that normal map is present)
00165             if(m_it->second->HasTiles())
00166                 vert_vars += "uniform float " + texname + "_tileX, " + texname + "_tileY;\n";
00167             vert_vars += "uniform float " + texname + "_intensity;\n"
00168                 "uniform sampler2D "+ texname + ";\n";
00169             vert_main +=  "  //displace vertex\n";
00170             //tiles: tile texture coordinate
00171             if(m_it->second->HasTiles())
00172                 vert_main += "  vec4 dv = textureLod(" + texname + ", in_Coord*vec2(" + texname + "_tileX, " + texname + "_tileY), 0.0);\n";
00173             //no tiles
00174             else
00175                 vert_main += "  vec4 dv = textureLod(" + texname + ", in_Coord, 0.0);\n";
00176             //displace vertex along normal
00177             vert_main += "  float displace = dv.r; //dot( vec4(0.30,0.59,0.11,0.0),dv);\n"
00178                 "  vertex.xyz += " + texname + "_intensity * displace * in_Normal;\n";
00179             displace = true;
00180             break;
00181         }
00182     }
00183     //require also normal map
00184     if(displace)
00185     {
00186         for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00187         {
00188             if(m_it->second->GetType() == BUMP)
00189             {
00190                 string texname = m_it->second->GetName();
00191                 if(m_it->second->HasTiles())
00192                     vert_vars += "uniform float " + texname + "_tileX, " + texname + "_tileY;\n";
00193                 vert_vars += "uniform float " + texname + "_intensity;\n"
00194                     "uniform sampler2D "+ texname + ";\n";
00195                 vert_main       += "  //displace normal using normal map\n";
00196                 //tiles: tile texture coordinate
00197                 if(m_it->second->HasTiles())
00198                     vert_main   += "  dNormal += normalize(texture(" + texname + ",in_Coord*vec2(" + texname + "_tileX, " + texname + "_tileY)).rgb * 2.0 - 1.0);\n\n";
00199                 //no tiles
00200                 else
00201                     vert_main   += "  dNormal += normalize(texture(" + texname + ",in_Coord).rgb * 2.0 - 1.0);\n\n";
00202                 break;
00203             }
00204         }
00205     }
00206 
00207 
00208     //*****************************
00210 
00211     tmp += "Env";
00213     if(m_lightModel == PHONG || m_textures.find(tmp) != m_textures.end() )
00214     {
00215         vert_vars += "out vec3 normal, eyeVec;\n";  //varying variables
00216         vert_main +=
00217             "  normal = mat3(in_ModelViewMatrix) * dNormal;  //surface normal\n"
00218             "  eyeVec = -vec3(in_ModelViewMatrix * vertex);   //eyeview vector\n";
00219     }
00220 
00222     else if(m_lightModel == GOURAUD)
00223     {
00224         vert_vars += "out vec4 v_color;\n"
00225             "out vec3 normal, eyeVec;\n";
00226 
00227         vert_func += LoadFunc("light");
00228         vert_main +=
00229             "  normal = mat3(in_ModelViewMatrix) * dNormal;  //surface normal\n"
00230             "  eyeVec = -vec3(in_ModelViewMatrix * vertex);            //eyeview vector\n"
00231             "  v_color = LightModel(normal, eyeVec);                   //calculate light model\n";
00232     }
00233     //no light model
00234     else
00235     {
00236         vert_vars += "out vec3 normal;\n";
00237         vert_main += "  normal = mat3(in_ModelViewMatrix) * dNormal;  //surface normal\n";
00238     }
00239 
00240     //**********************************
00241     //Textures
00242 
00244     vert_main += "  fragTexCoord = in_Coord;\n";
00245 
00246 
00247     //******************************
00248     //iterate through textures
00249     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00250     {
00252         if(m_it->second->GetType() == SHADOW)
00253         {
00254             vert_vars += "out vec4 " + m_it->first + "_projShadow;\n";
00255             vert_main += "  " + m_it->first + "_projShadow = " + m_it->first + "_texMatrix * in_ModelViewMatrix * vertex;   //calculate shadow texture projection\n";
00256         }
00257         //dual-paraboloid shadow map - insert output vertex (only once)
00258         if(m_it->second->GetType() == SHADOW_OMNI && m_it->first.find("ShadowOMNI_A") != string::npos)
00259         {
00260             vert_vars += "out vec4 o_vertex;\n";
00261             vert_main += "  o_vertex = vertex;   //vertex object-space position\n";
00262         }
00264         if(m_it->second->GetType() == CUBEMAP)
00265         {
00266             vert_vars += "out vec3 " + m_it->first + "_cubeCoords;\n";
00267             vert_main += "  " + m_it->first + "_cubeCoords = vertex.xyz;\n";
00268         }
00269 
00271         if(m_it->second->GetType() == CUBEMAP_ENV)
00272         {
00273             vert_vars += "out vec3 r_normal, r_eyeVec;\n";
00274             vert_main += 
00275                 "\n  //Camera rotation can be found in transposed modelview matrix\n"
00276                 "   mat3 tcamerarot;\n"
00277                 "   tcamerarot[0][0] = in_ModelViewMatrix[0][0];\n"
00278                 "   tcamerarot[0][1] = in_ModelViewMatrix[1][0];\n"
00279                 "   tcamerarot[0][2] = in_ModelViewMatrix[2][0];\n"
00280                 "   tcamerarot[1][0] = in_ModelViewMatrix[0][1];\n"
00281                 "   tcamerarot[1][1] = in_ModelViewMatrix[1][1];\n"
00282                 "   tcamerarot[1][2] = in_ModelViewMatrix[2][1];\n"
00283                 "   tcamerarot[2][0] = in_ModelViewMatrix[0][2];\n"
00284                 "   tcamerarot[2][1] = in_ModelViewMatrix[1][2];\n"
00285                 "   tcamerarot[2][2] = in_ModelViewMatrix[2][2];\n\n"
00286                 "\n  //Coordinates for cubemap reflexion\n"
00287                 "  r_normal = tcamerarot * (in_ModelViewMatrix * vec4(dNormal,0.0)).xyz;\n"
00288                 "  r_eyeVec = tcamerarot * (in_ModelViewMatrix * vertex).xyz;\n\n";
00289         }
00290     }
00291 
00292     //**********************************************
00294     vert_main +=
00295         "  vec4 viewPos = in_ModelViewMatrix * vertex;       //vertex transform\n"
00296         "  v_depth = -viewPos.z;                             //store depth\n"
00297         "  gl_Position = in_ProjectionMatrix * viewPos;      //projection transform\n"     
00298         "}\n"
00299         "\n";
00300 
00301     string vertex_shader = "#version " + version + " compatibility\n";
00302     vertex_shader += vert_vars + vert_func + vert_main;
00303 
00304 
00308 
00310     string frag_vars = "//GLSL fragment shader generated by gluxEngine\n\n";
00311     frag_vars +=    "//Material: \"" + m_name + "\"\n\n"
00312         "const int LIGHTS = " + num2str(light_count) + ";\n\n"      //scene light count
00313         "//texture coordinate\n"
00314         "in vec2 fragTexCoord;\n"
00315         "//fragment depth in world space\n"
00316         "in float v_depth;\n";
00317 
00318     //fragment shader output
00319     if(m_useMRT)
00320         frag_vars += "out vec4 out_FragData[2];\n\n";
00321     else
00322         frag_vars += "out vec4 out_FragColor;\n\n";
00323 
00324     string frag_func;                                                         //fragment shader functions
00325     string frag_main = "\nvoid main()\n{\n";                                  //fragment shader main function
00326 
00327     bool bump = false;      //do we have bump map present?
00328 
00329 
00330     //**********************************
00332     frag_main += "  vec2 texCoord = fragTexCoord;\n";
00333 
00334     //for parallax/depth map, we modify texture coordinate
00335     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00336     {    
00337         if(m_it->second->GetType() == PARALLAX)
00338         {
00339             string offset;
00340             offset = num2str(m_it->second->GetIntensity());  //parallax offset value
00341             frag_main +=
00342                 "  //simple parallax mapping, modify texture coordinates\n"
00343                 "  float height = texture(" + m_name + "ParallaxA,  texCoord).r;\n"
00344                 "  float offset = " + offset + " * (2.0 * height - 1.0);\n"
00345                 "  texCoord = texCoord + eyeVec.xy * offset;\n\n";
00346             break;
00347         }
00348     }
00349 
00350     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00351     {
00352         if(!m_it->second->Empty() && m_it->second->GetType() != SHADOW && m_it->second->GetType() != SHADOW_OMNI && m_it->second->GetType() != DISPLACE )
00353         {
00354             frag_main += "\n  vec4 " + m_it->first + "_texture;\n";
00355 
00356             //cube map, we add different sampler + 3D coordinates
00357             if(m_it->second->GetType() == CUBEMAP) 
00358                 frag_vars += "uniform samplerCube "+ m_it->first + ";\nin vec3 " + m_it->first + "_cubeCoords;\n\n";
00359             //environment cube map, we need cube sampler and normal + view vector
00360             else if(m_it->second->GetType() == CUBEMAP_ENV) 
00361             {
00362                 frag_vars += "uniform samplerCube "+ m_it->first + ";\n"
00363                     "uniform float " + m_it->first + "_intensity;\n"
00364                     "in vec3 r_normal, r_eyeVec;\n\n";
00365             }
00366             //regular 2D texture sampler
00367             else 
00368             {
00369                 //texture intensity
00370                 frag_vars += "uniform float " + m_it->first + "_intensity;\n";
00371                 //texture tiles (if set)
00372                 if(m_it->second->HasTiles())
00373                 {
00374                     frag_vars += "uniform float " + m_it->first + "_tileX," + m_it->first + "_tileY;\n";
00375                     frag_main +=
00376                         "  //" + m_it->first + ", texture tiles\n"
00377                         "  vec2 " + m_it->first + "_texcoord = texCoord * vec2(" + m_it->first + "_tileX, " + m_it->first + "_tileY) ;\n";
00378                 }
00379                 //no tiles
00380                 else
00381                     frag_main += "  vec2 " + m_it->first + "_texcoord = texCoord;\n";
00382 
00383                 frag_vars += "uniform sampler2D "+ m_it->first + ";\n";
00384             }
00385         }
00386     }
00387 
00388 
00389     //**********************************
00391     if(m_lightModel == PHONG)    //PHONG, per-pixel
00392     {  
00393         frag_vars +=  "in vec3 normal, eyeVec;\n";
00394         frag_func += LoadFunc("light");
00395 
00397         tmp = m_name; tmp += "BumpA";
00398         if( m_textures.find(tmp) != m_textures.end() )
00399         {
00400             bump = true;
00401             frag_main +=
00402                 "  //bump-mapping\n"
00403                 "  vec3 bump_normal = normal + normalize(texture(" + m_name + "BumpA, " + tmp + "_texcoord).xyz*2.0 - " + m_name + "BumpA_intensity);\n"
00404                 "  vec4 color = LightModel(bump_normal,eyeVec);\n";   
00405         }
00406         else
00407             frag_main +="  vec4 color = LightModel(normal,eyeVec);\n";
00408     }
00410     else if(m_lightModel == GOURAUD) 
00411     {
00412         frag_vars += "in vec4 v_color;\n"
00413             "in vec3 normal;\n";
00414         frag_main += "  vec4 color = v_color;\n";
00415     }
00417     else
00418     {
00419         frag_vars += "in vec3 normal;\n\n"
00420             "//material settings (only diffuse)\n"
00421             "struct Material{\n"
00422             "  vec3 diffuse;\n};\n"
00423             "uniform Material material;\n";
00424         frag_main += "  vec4 color = vec4(material.diffuse,0.0);\n";
00425     }
00426 
00427 
00428     //***************************************************
00430     string alpha_test = "";
00431     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00432     {
00433         if(!m_it->second->Empty())
00434         {
00435             //skip displacement map
00436             if(m_it->second->GetType() == DISPLACE)
00437                 continue;
00439             else if(m_it->second->GetType() == SHADOW)
00440             {
00441                 frag_vars += "in vec4 " + m_it->first + "_projShadow;\n";
00442                 frag_vars +=
00443                     "uniform float " + m_it->first + "_intensity;\n"
00444                     "uniform sampler2DShadow " + m_it->first + ";\n";
00445 
00446                 //insert shadow function (only once)
00447                 if(m_it->first.find("ShadowA") != string::npos)
00448                     frag_func += LoadFunc("shadow");
00449 
00450                 frag_main += "\n  //Shadow map projection\n"
00451                     "  color *= PCFShadow(" + m_it->first + "," + m_it->first + "_projShadow, " + m_it->first + "_intensity);\n";
00452             }
00453             else if(m_it->second->GetType() == SHADOW_OMNI)
00454             {
00455                 frag_vars +=
00456                     "uniform float " + m_it->first + "_intensity;\n"
00457                     "uniform sampler2DArray " + m_it->first + ";\n";
00458 
00459                 //insert shadow function (only once)
00460                 if(m_it->first.find("ShadowOMNI_A") != string::npos)
00461                     frag_func += LoadFunc("shadow_omni");
00462 
00463                 frag_main += "\n  //Shadow map projection\n"
00464                     "  color *= ShadowOMNI(" + m_it->first + ", " + m_it->first + "_intensity);\n";
00465             }
00466 
00467             //other texture types
00468             else
00469             {
00470                 //should we use alpha testing?
00471                 if(m_it->second->GetType() == ALPHA)
00472                     alpha_test = "  //alpha test\n  if( all(lessThan(" + m_it->first + "_texture.rgb, vec3(0.25)))) discard;\n";
00473 
00475                 if(m_it->second->GetType() == ENV)
00476                 {
00477                     //when we have more env maps, insert env function only once
00478                     if(m_it->first.find("EnvB") == string::npos)
00479                     {
00480 
00481                         if(m_lightModel != PHONG)
00482                             frag_vars += "in vec3 eyeVec;\n";
00483                         //add environment map computation
00484                         frag_func += LoadFunc("env");
00485                     }
00486                 }
00487 
00488                 //reflect fragment from environment cubemap
00489                 if(m_it->second->GetType() == CUBEMAP_ENV)
00490                 {
00491                     if(bump)    //if we have bump map, modify reflection vector to get bumpy reflections
00492                         frag_main += "  vec3 reflVec = reflect(normalize(r_eyeVec), normalize(bump_normal)); //bumped reflection vector for cubemap\n";
00493                     else
00494                         frag_main += "  vec3 reflVec = reflect(normalize(r_eyeVec), normalize(r_normal)); //reflection vector for cubemap\n";
00495                 }
00496 
00497                 //compute fragment color from texel(not for bump/parallax map)
00498                 if(m_it->second->GetType() != BUMP && m_it->second->GetType() != PARALLAX)
00499                     frag_main += computeTexel(m_it->second,m_it->first);
00500 
00501             }
00502         }
00503     }
00504 
00505 
00506     //***********************************************
00508     frag_main +=
00509         "\n  //FINAL fragment color\n";
00510 
00511     //do we use MRT?
00512     if(m_useMRT)
00513     {
00514         //is material transparent?
00515         if(m_transparency > 0.0)
00516         {
00517             string trans;
00518             trans = num2str(m_transparency);
00519             frag_main += 
00520                 "  out_FragData[0] = vec4(vec3(color.rgb),  " + trans + ");\n"
00521                 "  out_FragData[1].rgb = normal;    //normal;\n";
00522             frag_main +=
00523                     "  out_FragData[1].a = v_depth;    //depth\n";
00524 
00525         }
00526         //alpha test fragment
00527         else
00528         {
00529             frag_main += alpha_test + 
00530                 "  out_FragData[0].rgb = color.rgb; //color;\n"
00531                 "  out_FragData[1].rgb = normal;    //normal;\n";
00532             frag_main += "  out_FragData[1].a = v_depth;    //depth\n";
00533         }
00534     }
00535     else
00536     {
00537         //is material transparent?
00538         if(m_transparency > 0.0)
00539         {
00540             string trans;
00541             trans = num2str(m_transparency);
00542             frag_main += "  out_FragColor = vec4(vec3(color.rgb),  " + trans + ");\n";
00543         }
00544         else
00545         {
00546             //alpha test fragment
00547             frag_main += alpha_test + "  out_FragColor = color;\n";
00548         }
00549     }
00550 
00551     frag_main +=
00552         "}\n"
00553         "\n";
00554     string frag_shader = "#version " + version + " compatibility\n";
00555     frag_shader += frag_vars + frag_func + frag_main;

00560     //save shaders to debug file
00561     string file; file = "../shader_out/" + m_name + ".vert";
00562     ofstream fout1(file.c_str());
00563     fout1<<vertex_shader;
00564     file = "../shader_out/" + m_name + ".frag";
00565     ofstream fout2(file.c_str());
00566     fout2<<frag_shader;
00567 
00569     m_v_shader = glCreateShader(GL_VERTEX_SHADER);
00570     m_f_shader = glCreateShader(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER);
00571 
00572     //copy shader data
00573     const char *ff = frag_shader.c_str();
00574     const char *vv = vertex_shader.c_str();
00575 
00576     //set shader source
00577     glShaderSource(m_v_shader, 1, &vv,NULL);
00578     glShaderSource(m_f_shader, 1, &ff,NULL);
00579 
00580     //compile and detect shader errors
00581     char log[BUFFER]; int len;
00582     glCompileShader(m_v_shader);
00583     glCompileShader(m_f_shader);
00584 
00585     //create and link shader program
00586     m_shader = glCreateProgram();
00587     glAttachShader(m_shader,m_f_shader);
00588     glAttachShader(m_shader,m_v_shader);
00589 
00590     glLinkProgram(m_shader);
00591     glUseProgram(m_shader);
00592 
00593 
00594     //shader creation status
00595     glGetShaderInfoLog(m_v_shader, BUFFER, &len, log);
00596     if(strstr(log, "succes") == NULL && len > 0) 
00597         cout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;    //print error if any
00598     glGetShaderInfoLog(m_f_shader, BUFFER, &len, log);
00599     if(strstr(log, "succes") == NULL && len > 0) 
00600         cout<<endl<<m_name<<":"<<log;    //print error if any
00601 
00602 
00603     //*************************************
00605     int i=0;
00606     for(m_it = m_textures.begin(); m_it != m_textures.end(); ++m_it)
00607     {
00608         if(!m_it->second->Empty())
00609         {
00610             m_it->second->GetUniforms(m_shader);
00611             m_it->second->ActivateTexture(i,true);
00612             i++;
00613         }
00614     }
00615 
00617     SetUniform("material.ambient",m_ambColor);
00618     SetUniform("material.diffuse",m_diffColor);
00619     SetUniform("material.specular",m_specColor);
00620     SetUniform("material.shininess",m_shininess);
00621 
00622     m_baked = true;
00623 
00624     //setup uniform buffers
00625     GLuint uniformIndex = glGetUniformBlockIndex(m_shader, "Matrices");
00626     glUniformBlockBinding(m_shader, uniformIndex, UNIFORM_MATRICES);
00627     uniformIndex = glGetUniformBlockIndex(m_shader, "Lights");
00628     glUniformBlockBinding(m_shader, uniformIndex, UNIFORM_LIGHTS);
00629     glUseProgram(0);
00630 
00631     //print_uniform_block_info(shader, uniformIndex);
00632 
00633     return true;
00634 }
